thread.section_title: The Premier New York Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and complementary drinks
thread.title_full: Great location and complementary drinks - Review of The Premier New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kristof M
title: Great location and complementary drinks
text:
The location of the hotel is absolutely great. You are at time square and close to all Broadway shows. The staff was very friendly and the rooms where of a decent size,especially for New York standards.
The complementary drinks during happy hour are greatly appreciated, it doesn't happen often that a hotel is offering free drinks (beer, wine and minerals).
Pleased with our stay and would recommend the hotel to others, definitely great place to be for tourists.
